text: Delightful shop with a fantastic selection of groceries including meats, vegetables and dairy products for your daily needs, a weekend bbq and even a year-end party. Ken can marinate your meats, make you a mean roast and teach you how to start a bbq fire ðŸ˜€ Reliable and thoughtful service - a real boon to the neighbourhood.

Ridgewood Gourmet has been my go-to for Christmas roasts and quality produce for barbecues, in the last 6 years.  Ken is also very helpful in advising on what to purchase and on portion sizing.  We love the sirloin for Christmas 2024, perfectly cooked!

Ridgewood Gourmet is a humble looking shop but its meat offerings are kingly.
Behind the counter stands proprietor Ken who always has a kind word and a good suggestion on what meats is best to buy.

The roast goose pictured is a specialty offered by Ken every Christmas. Itâ€™s v good.
Great place for great products - have known Ken and Ridgewood for close to 10 years now, i go in for the meat, best quality priced products!

Always open, Always there when needed, always try to accomodate! Ridgewood Gourmet is the ideal local shop with the perfect owner that will systematically try to make you happy for your retail needs. !!
